sections.title: Structure

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Applicable as it is essential to maintain a standard structure with clarity in sections describing the structure.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: The section clearly outlines the structural domains and configuration of the AGK protein.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: The section provides a clear description of the structural components, but lacks a broader organizational context that would be provided by a standard structure including subsections.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Relevant to ensure the content is logically structured, especially when detailing complex structures.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: Description of the AGK's integration into the mitochondrial inner membrane is clear but could be better organized with subheadings.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: The structure is adequately described but could benefit from more sub-categorical organization for enhanced clarity.
requirement_evaluations.overlap_notes: No notable overlaps with other sections.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: This requirement applies to ensure clear and logical structuring throughout the article.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: The section is organized into distinct parts describing protein domains and structural orientation.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: While the main elements are clear, further breakdown into subsections would improve clarity.
requirement_evaluations.overlap_notes: Content specificity to this section makes overlap with others minimal.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: This is similar to R14 and thus not separately applicable as its own evaluation for this section.
Using subheadings could organize the content better, especially when multiple topics are addressed.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: There is no use of subheadings in this section, leading to minor clarification issues.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: Subheadings could clarify content divisions, which are currently inferred rather than explicitly structured.

sections.meta_notes: The section portrays essential information on the AGK protein structure but could improve with additional structuring refinements like subheadings to enhance clarity.
